name: Cardinal.mk_smul_set₀
initialProofState:
G₀ : Type u_1
M₀ : Type u_2
inst✝² : GroupWithZero G₀
inst✝¹ : Zero M₀
inst✝ : MulActionWithZero G₀ M₀
a : G₀
ha : Ne a 0
s : Set M₀
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk ↑(HSMul.hSMul a s)) (Cardinal.mk ↑s)
decl:
lemma _root_.Cardinal.mk_smul_set₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) (s : Set M₀) : #↥(a • s) = #s :=
  Cardinal.mk_image_eq_of_injOn _ _ (MulAction.injective₀ ha).injOn

name: Set.natCard_smul_set₀
initialProofState:
G₀ : Type u_1
M₀ : Type u_2
inst✝² : GroupWithZero G₀
inst✝¹ : Zero M₀
inst✝ : MulActionWithZero G₀ M₀
a : G₀
ha : Ne a 0
s : Set M₀
⊢ Eq (Nat.card ↑(HSMul.hSMul a s)) (Nat.card ↑s)
decl:
lemma natCard_smul_set₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) (s : Set M₀) : Nat.card ↥(a • s) = Nat.card s :=
  Nat.card_image_of_injective (MulAction.injective₀ ha) _
